extensionDescription.message: Automatically skip Ads, Intros, Recaps, Credits, etc. on Netflix, Prime video and Disney+.

sharedSettingsDescription.message: These options will only enable/disable the $service$ part of the shared setting

defaultPageTitle.message: All turned off Features by default

defaultPageDescription.message: Every feature which is turned off by default either because they are confusing if they were turned on or they are in beta

DefaultPaidContentDescription.message: Removing every paid movie/film category from Amazon prime

SharedPageDescription.message: These options will only enable/disable the settings for all streaming services. If you want to only disable it specifically for one you have to go to its Individual settings.

SharedIntroDescription.message: Skipping the intros and recaps of any series. Except Netflix since there Recaps cannot be watched again.

CreditsSwitchDescription.message: Skipping to the next episode of every series as fast as possible

AdsSwitchDescription.message: Skipping freevee ads for amazon and all of the ads in the basic Netflix tier

SliderSwitch.description: Add a speed slider feature switch

SliderSwitchDescription.message: Adding a speed adjustment slider to every video

FullscreenSwitchDescription.message: If a video is put on fullscreen, the video will play automatically

SelfAdsSwitchDescription.message: Skipping the prime show previews which are shown before any video

example.description: Tells the user which link they clicked.
